chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has a problem:
The phone is in perfect condition. The return is due to the fact that it does not meet the characteristics I need.

Thank you,

Hello ecomobile,

The client is contacting us because you have received the package for a withdrawal on 11/06/24. We remind you that the period to reimburse is 48 working hours in the case of a withdrawal. If you have not reimbursed the customer before 14/06/24, we will reimburse the order.

Thank you in advance for your attention,
Jose Back Market customer Care

Hola, agente
El vendedor no puede proceder al reenvío debido al siguiente motivo:
El artículo está bloqueado por un código o patrón.
Se ha añadido más información en este mensaje: Dear Backcare,

The phone seems to be locked with a code. Could you inform the customer to provide the code to unlock the phone?

Regards,
AS
